${ModID}:SecondImposter.NAME: Second Imposter
${ModID}:SecondImposter.FLAVOR: Two can be as bad as one.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die, restore to 100% HP, remove all buffs and debuffs, and prevent all incoming buffs, debuffs, and damage until the start of your next turn or until you play a card.  Lose 50% max HP.  Works once.
This relic has been used up.

${ModID}:BrainSlug.NAME: Brain Slug
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer its #yVotes to a random enemy.

${ModID}:ClaustrophilicHamster.NAME: Claustrophilic Hamster
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you #yVent each turn, gain [E].

${ModID}:DevilHorns.NAME: Devil Horns
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer its #ySus to a random enemy.

${ModID}:DUMStickyNote.NAME: DUM Sticky Note
DESCRIPTIONS: Randomize the cost of the cards in your starting hand from #b0-2.

${ModID}:LongTongue.NAME: Long Tongue
DESCRIPTIONS: Attacks containing "Kill" in deal #b4 additional damage.

${ModID}:PlagueDoctorMask.NAME: Plague Doctor Mask
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain 1 #yVote.  At the start of your 2nd turn, #yVent.

${ModID}:SheriffHat.NAME: Sheriff Hat
${ModID}:SheriffHat.FLAVOR: The long arm of the law extends out to space.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, all enemies with #ySus gain 1 additional #ySus.

${ModID}:ThirdImposter.NAME: Third Imposter
${ModID}:ThirdImposter.FLAVOR: Two can be as bad as one.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die, restore to 100% HP, remove all buffs and debuffs, and prevent all incoming buffs, debuffs, and damage until the start of your next turn or until you play a card.  Works #b2 times.

${ModID}:TopHat.NAME: Top Hat
${ModID}:TopHat.FLAVOR: Just doing my civic duty, sir.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply 2 #yVote to a random enemy.  That enemy loses 2 #yStrength.

${ModID}:ToyUFO.NAME: Toy UFO
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply 3 #ySus to ALL enemies.
